alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:22PM EDT until May 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in northern New York... Northeastern St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 121 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Azure Mountain, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Moira, Fort Covington, Bombay, Helena, Brasher Falls, St. Regis, Lake Ozonia, Brushton, Madawaska, Lawrenceville, Dickinson, Hopkinton, Santa Clara, Fort Covington Center, Dickinson Center, South Bombay, Brasher Center, St. Lawrence State Park, Ironton and Raquette River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
